Description: MCU Module with BLE and USB-C

Reference: - You already have U1 (ESP32-C3) and U2 (SCD41), valued at $54.95
- Priority purchases: U3 (SGP41), U4 (OLED), BT1 (Battery), U5 (TP4056)
- Passive components (resistors, caps, LEDs) can be purchased as assortment kits for ~$10
- PCB fabrication from JLCPCB is ~$5 for 5 pieces (2-5 day turnaround)
- Consider ordering 5 PCBs to have spares for testing and iterations
